querys.Query: SELECT FORMAT(l.leg_numero, '0') as Legajo, l.leg_apellido AS Apellido, l.leg_nombre as Nombre, FORMAT(l.leg_numeromanager, '0') as Gerente, FORMAT(l.leg_fecing, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as FechaIng, l.Leg_mail as Mail,  FORMAT((l.leg_numero * 100), '0') as Sueldo,  Rcc.cco_codigo AS CcNum, FORMAT(Rcc.lcco_porcen, '00') AS CcPorc FROM SJITP.dbo.leg l LEFT JOIN SJITP.dbo.leg_cco_2 Rcc ON l.leg_numero = Rcc.leg_numero where leg_fecegr is NULL OR (leg_fecegr IS NOT NULL AND leg_fecegr >= DATEADD(DAY, -60, GETDATE()))   -- deja los que se fueron en los últimos 30 días ORDER BY leg_apellido, leg_nombre FOR JSON AUTO
SELECT pro_cod as numeroDoc, (pro_RazSoc + ' (' +  pro_Cod) + ')' as razonSocial FROM SBDAITP.dbo.Proveed WHERE pro_Habilitado = 1 ORDER BY pro_RazSoc FOR JSON AUTO

SELECT c.cco_codigo as codigo, '(' +  c.cco_codigo + ') - ' + cco_descrip + ' - ' + ISNULL(l.cli_RazSoc, ' ') + ' (' + ISNULL(cli_CUIT, ' ') + ')' as descripcioncecos, ISNULL(l.cli_RazSoc, ' ') as cliente, cco_descrip as proyecto FROM SBDAITP.dbo.cco c LEFT JOIN SBDAITP.dbo.Clientes l ON c.def2_codigo = SUBSTRING(l.cli_Cod, 3, 4) WHERE cco_habili = 1 ORDER BY c.cco_codigo FOR JSON AUTO
